Detailed Description

This class uses Intel Threading Building Blocks to run tasks.

Member Function Documentation

void TaskManagerTBB::Init ( void   )  [virtual]

Call this from the primary thread before calling any other TaskManagerTBB methods.

Implements TaskManager.

void TaskManagerTBB::Shutdown ( void   )  [virtual]

Call this from the primary thread as the last TaskManagerTBB call.

Implements TaskManager.

void TaskManagerTBB::IssueJobsForSystemTasks ( ISystemTask **  pTasks,
u32  uCount,
f32  fDeltaTime 
) [virtual]

Call this from the primary thread to schedule system work.

Parameters:
pTasks an array of ISystemTask objects which should have their Update() methods called asynchronously
uCount the size of the pTasks array
fDeltaTime amount of time to be passed to each system's Update method
See also:
TaskManagerTBB::WaitForSystemTasks, ISystemTask::Update

Implements TaskManager.

void TaskManagerTBB::NonStandardPerThreadCallback ( JobFunction  pfnCallback,
void *  pData 
) [virtual]

This method triggers a synchronized callback to be called once by each thread used by the TaskManagerTBB. This method waits until all callbacks have executed.

Unlike the general contract for this method, this method can be safely called at any time, as long as the call is made from the primary thread.

Parameters:
pfnCallback the function callback to execute
pData a pointer to data that is passed to the callback

u32 TaskManagerTBB::GetRecommendedJobCount ( ITaskManager::JobCountInstructionHints  Hints  )  [virtual]

Call this method to determine the ideal number of tasks to submit to the TaskManagerTBB for maximum performance. Hints is ignored and the number of active threads is always returned.

Parameters:
Hints guidance on the type of work done in the jobs about to be submitted
Returns:
the number of jobs which is optimal for the type of work specified by Hints

void TaskManagerTBB::WaitForSystemTasks ( ISystemTask **  pTasks,
u32  uCount 
) [virtual]

Call this from the primary thread to wait until specified tasks spawned with IssueJobsForSystemTasks and all of their subtasks are complete.

Parameters:
pTasks an array of ISystemTask objects
uCount the length of the pTasks array
See also:
TaskManagerTBB::IssueJobsForSystemTasks

Implements TaskManager.

u32 TaskManagerTBB::GetNumberOfThreads ( void   ) 

Call this method to get the number of threads in the thread pool which are active for running work.

Returns:
the number of threads being used

void TaskManagerTBB::SetNumberOfThreads ( u32  uNumberOfThreads  )  [virtual]

Parameters:
uNumberOfThreads the limit of the number of threads to use

This method constrains the number of threads used by the TaskManagerTBB.

Implements Interface::ITaskManager.
